ARABIC: وَمِمَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ أُمَّةٌ يَهْدُونَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعْدِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Among those We have created there is a community who guide by the Truth and act justly according to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet there are among those We have created people who lead (others) to the truth, and act justly in its light
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And of those whom We have created there is a party who guide men through the truth and act justly according to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Among Our creatures are a group who guide and judge with the Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And from Our creation is a group that shows the truth and establishes justice with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And of those whom We have created, there is a community who guides (others) with the truth, and establishes justice therewith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And of those whom We have created are a people who guide with the truth and thereby they do justice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Of those We created are a nation who guide by the truth, and by it act with justice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And of those whom We created there is a nation who guide with the Truth and establish justice therewith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Of those We have created there are some who give true guidance and act justly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And of those whom We have created there is a community guiding others with truth and acting justly according thereto.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Among those We have created are a nation who guide by the truth and do justice thereby.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Of those We have created are people who direct (others) with truth. And dispense justice therewith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And of those whom We have created, there is a community who guides (others) with the truth, and establishes justice therewith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Among those whom We created there is a nation who guide with the truth and with it they are just.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Among those We created is a community—they guide by truth, and do justice thereby.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And among those We created is a community which guides by truth and thereby establishes justice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:181] And of those whom We created there is a community who guide by the truth, and act justly therewith: this is the community of Muhammad (s), as stated in a hadīth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And of those whom We created there is a nation) a group (who guide with the Truth) bid to the Truth (and establish justice therewith) and act upon the Truth. This group is the Community of Muhammad (pbuh).
